devdoc.details: See https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-721Note: The ERC-165 identifier for this interface is 0xf3993d11.

batchTransferFrom(address,address,uint25.details: Reverts if `to` is the zero address.Reverts if the sender is not approved.Reverts if one of `tokenIds` is not owned by `from`.Resets the token approval for each of `tokenIds`.Emits an {IERC721-Transfer} event for each of `tokenIds`.

params.to: Address of the new token owner.
params.tokenIds: Identifiers of the tokens to transfer.

devdoc.title: ERC721 Non-Fungible Token Standard, optional extension: Batch Transfer.

batchTransferFrom(address,address,uint25.notice: Unsafely transfers a batch of tokens.
